abstract: The interruption was not only a diversion, but also changed the momentum in the game, helping to retain an audience that otherwise might have tuned out.
snippet: The interruption was not only a diversion, but also changed the momentum in the game, helping to retain an audience that otherwise might have tuned out.
lead_paragraph: 8:43 p.m. | Updated CBS came close to matching the audience levels of the two most-watched television events of all time Sunday night, turning an electrical failure in the New Orleans Superdome into a likely ratings advantage for its coverage of Super Bowl XLVII.

headline.main: Blackout Is a Boon for Super Bowl Ratings
headline.print_headline: Power Failure Delivers a Surge to Super Bowl Ratings for CBS
